title: Revert to Version 10

requirements.text: Revert the LoginPage component to its Version 10 state, removing the centered card layout, 'Welcome Back' heading, 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' subtitle, email and password input fields with icons, green 'Sign In' button, 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link, and 'Back to Home' link. Restore the previous login interface implementation that was present before Version 11.

quotes: undo change and go back to version 10

acceptanceCriteria: All Version 11 login design changes are removed
Internet Identity authentication functionality remains intact
Users can successfully authenticate using the restored interface

constraints: Do not modify backend main.mo or migration.mo files
Do not change authentication flow logic in useInternetIdentity.ts or useActor.ts
nonGoals: Modifying other pages or components beyond LoginPage
